description.narrative: The Nationally Determined Contribution Support Programme (NDCSP) strategy aims at enhancing the Nationally Determined Contribution (NDC) implementation and synchronization with the Sustainable Development Goals and at mainstreaming gender in the NDC.

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: - Number of databases, tools, operational and institutional documents developed to assess, track and enforce the NDC implementation and enforcement. - Number of awareness, capacity building material, trainings produced to mainstream and track gender considerations in NDC implementation, policies and climate change.

comment.narrative: Lebanon’s Nationally Determined Contribution (NDC) is prepared and endorsed.
